entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
